Package command.library

This package contains all concrete command which are known by the DOSBox.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CmdDate Befehl zum Anzeigen und Setzen des Datums
CmdDateTime Abstrakte Basisklasse für den Date und Time Command.
CmdExit Befehl zum Verlassen der DosBox.
CmdFormat Format Command.
CmdHelp Gibt das Help für ein entsprechendes Commando aus.
CmdRename Rename files and directories.
CmdTime Befehl zum Anzeigen und Setzen der Zeit
CmdType Type/Cat Command, displays the content of a text file on the screen.
CmdVer Ver(sion) Command, shows the application name, authors and version.
CommandFactory The factory is responsible to create an object of every command supported and to add it to the list of known commands.
 

Package command.library Description

This package contains all concrete command which are known by the DOSBox. A factory in this package is responsible to create the objects of the commands.

Pattern: Command (Role: Concrete Commands)

Allowed Collaborations:

  • filesystem: Required to perform the commands.
  • command.framework: All concrete commands are derived from command.framework.Command. Interfacer Outputter required to send strings to caller.
  • Any Java package
